title: Miu Miu brand typeface
content:
Hi. I bet this one is a custom font but you never know... Any suggestions gratefully received. Thanks

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [image.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20131107072115/http:/typophile.com/files/image_30.jpg) | 297.16 KB |
author: RBM

comments.content:
Don't know if it's actually a font, more probably a custom job as almost all woodmarks in the fashion industry. For the rest, it looks like some sort of [Bauhaus](http://web.archive.org/web/20131107072115/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/itc/bauhaus) stencil.

EDIT: unfortunately, even the stencil version of [Blippo](http://web.archive.org/web/20131107072115/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/blippo-lt) does not have the right stencil. Another good base font would be [Pump](http://web.archive.org/web/20131107072115/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/pump-lt).
Thanks very much. Seems to be a custom job based on the fonts you have mentioned above.
seems like all you'd really need is the correct "U". then turn & burn.
